title: This Week in Civic Tech Google Rethinks Democracy Redesigning Boston.gov Improve Detroit App Fixes 10000 Issues
text:
This Week in Civic Tech: Google Rethinks Democracy, Redesigning Boston.gov, 'Improve Detroit' App Fixes 10,000 Issues 
US Government Technology Friday 23rd October, 2015 
This Week in Civic Tech presents a line-up of notable events in the space that connects citizens to government services. Topics cover latest startups, hackathons, open data initiatives and other influencers. Check back each week for updates....
